Plot primary production data from Atlantis forcing files

Source: R/plot_pp.R
plot_pp.Rd

Plot primary production data from Atlantis forcing files

Usage

plot_pp(ppdata, filterbyepu = NULL, filterbypp = "Diatom_N")

Arguments

ppdata

list. output from ppdata

filterbyepu

Character string. Name of epu to plot. (Options = "MAB","GB","GOM","SS") Default = NULL

filterbypp

Character string. Name of primary producer to filter by. Default = "Diatom_N"

Value

Figures sent to Plots window
